short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds additional features to college scheduling portals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Schedule++ is an open-source browser extension that adds additional features to college scheduling. The current version of Schedule++ only works with University of Pittsburgh's PeopleSoft.

Features:
Currently, the extension adds visible RateMyProfessors scores to PeopleSoft on the following pages:
- Schedule
- Course Catalog
- Class Search
- Shopping Cart
- Edit Enrollment
- Drop Classes
- Schedule Builder
    - Select Sections
    - Schedules
    - Favorites

When available, Schedule++ will also show you the difficulty and quality for the course based on reviews for the professor.
